meanings.sent1: She displays her artwork proudly in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The museum displays ancient artifacts for visitors to see.
meanings.sent3: The magician displays a rabbit out of an empty hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile displays a warmth that lights up the room.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display in the sky dazzles everyone.

meanings.sent1: The art gallery hosts a new display every month.
meanings.sent2: The science museum has an interesting display on dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The fashion display featured the latest trends in clothing.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display in the park drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent5: The holiday lights display in the neighborhood is beautiful.

meanings.definition: An electronic screen for showing information or images
meanings.sent1: The digital display at the airport shows flight information.
meanings.sent2: The TV in the store window displays the latest news.
meanings.sent3: The electronic display glitched and showed random colors.
meanings.sent4: Her phone's display cracked after it fell on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The billboard display on the highway catches the attention of drivers.
